certified_cloud_practitioner.title: Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner is intended for anyone who has basic knowledge of the AWS platform,
it provides a fundamental understanding of AWS Cloud concepts, services, and terminology.

certified_developer_associate.title: Certified Developer - Associate
description: AWS Certified Developer - Associate showcases knowledge and understanding of core AWS services, uses, and basic AWS architecture best practices, and proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications by using AWS.
Preparing for and attaining this certification gives certified individuals more confidence and credibility.
Organizations with AWS Certified developers have the assurance of having the right talent to give them a competitive advantage and ensure stakeholder and customer satisfaction.
